segments.text: Good afternoon , sales department.May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could I speak to Mr Wood , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll see a piece available , who should I say is calling , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hold the line , please.Mr Wood is in the meeting with managing director at the moment I afraid.Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I want to discuss with them the new control we said last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think the meet will go on much longer , should I ask him to call you when he is free .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could I have your name again , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , you will be hearing from Mr Wood later in the afternoon then , Mr John .
segments.speaker: S1
